title: Just another bump in the road!!!
creator_credit: Michelle Carlin, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Michelle Carlin loved her job caring for disabled people. It has encouraged her to take a positive outlook on life no matter how much things go wrong and in turn this has helped her through some very tough times.
creator_credit_for_label: Michelle Carlin, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
